text: Bellevigne-les-Châteaux is a commune in the Maine-et-Loire department in western France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Chacé (the seat), Brézé and Saint-Cyr-en-Bourg.Arrêté préfectoral 20 September 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Maine-et-Loire department ==References== Category:Communes of Maine-et-Loire
title: Bellevigne-les-Châteaux
